content: The Patient Navigation Assistance Act of 2016, also known as the Patient Navigation Assistance Act, provides Medicaid coverage for patient navigator services. The Patient Navigation Assistance Act of 2016 amends Section 1902(a) of the Social Security Act to provide Medicaid reimbursement for patient navigator services for eligible individuals.
